sentences: Me näitame teile meie uut kodu.
context: The word 'näitame' is the 1st person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'näidata', which means 'to show'. It is used when 'we' are performing the action of showing or displaying something to others. The word can be translated as 'we show', 'we display', or 'we present' depending on context.
